newsitem.title: HUNGARY: HUNGARY NAMES SQUAD FOR WORLD CUP QUALIFIER..
newsitem.headline: HUNGARY NAMES SQUAD FOR WORLD CUP QUALIFIER..

text.p: Hungarian coach Janos Csank has announced his squad for World Cup Group Three qualifier with Switzerland to be played in Budapest on August 20th.

Ferencvaros midfielder Peter Lipcsei is named in the squad for the first time in over 18 months. Lipcsei, who returned to Ferencvaros in the summer after a spell with FC Porto in Portugal, missed most of last season through injury.
Key midfielder Florian Urban of Anderlecht, also returns to the squad after missing the previous qualifier against Norway, through suspension.
However experienced sweeper Emil Lorincz of MTK Budapest will miss the game through injury.
Goalkeepers: Gabor Babos (MTK Budapest, Szabolcs Safar (SV
Urban (Anderlecht), Bela Illes (MTK Budapest), Tamas Sandor
Budapest), Gabor Torma (Roda), Laszlo Klausz (SV Salzburg).
